Before they can begin their examination, several thumps from inside 
the pod give away the fact that the pod's auto-stasis protocols are 
offline.  This noise is followed by the hiss of the pod's hull 
starting to dissolve from within - as the transformer seeks to burn 
his way free of his prison with some highly caustic liquid ...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  Destructor saw the bleep on the screen. "Hydras we have another 
bot landed 
> outside in a stasis pod I'll go check it out." DEstructor walked 
down the 
> ramp and saaw the pod. The warning on the side caught him off 
guard. Proto 
> showed up behind him. "Lets take it inside and examine it 
first....a messed 
> up maximal is a dangerous predacon." They both grabbed the edge of 
the pod 
> and pulled it into the ship and down the hall into the lab.
